Is 3 lbs. of Carapils a lot? ...plus a pound of C15?
I've only used Carapils once, but am at a point where I'm terrified of using more than a pound and a half to two pounds of cara/crystal malts...
Was this the same proportions as the previous recipe?
You are totally right about the Carapils. I need to do more reading about it. I'm not sure that it belongs in this recipe!
